attributes.action: Make it a legal requirement that a safety helmet must be worn at all times when operating a bike
attributes.additional_details:
Make it a legal requirement that a safety helmet must be worn at all times when operating a bike on a road.
Responsible department: Department for Transport
What cost would you put on a life compared to the cost of a helmet?

For too long a large proportion of cyclists have been allowed to operate a bike without a safety helmet and this must be stopped.

STATISTICS AND FACTS:
Cyclist Casualties, 2011
Killed: 107
Seriously Injured: 3,085
Slightly Injured: 16,023
Total: 19,215

WHAT I RECOMMEND SHOULD HAPPEN:
I recommend that the government issue a heavy fine if a cyclist is caught not wearing a helmet. If the cyclist is under 16 then the parent should pay a greater fine or if the issue happens again court action.

Thank you for reading this e-petition and I urge you to share this petition.

Thanks
